title: Remove StatsOverview component from Dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: StatsOverview component removed from Dashboard.tsx
Token usage, model breakdown, daily activity charts no longer visible
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Part of Dashboard simplification - remove analytics/metadata display

title: Remove summary stat cards from Dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: 4 summary stat cards removed (Projects, Total Sessions, Active Sessions, Active Subagents)
Dashboard layout adjusts cleanly without stat cards
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Remove the stat cards grid from top of Dashboard

title: Remove filter toggle from Dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: All Projects / Active Only toggle removed from Dashboard
No filter UI elements remain in Dashboard header
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Toggle no longer needed since we always show active-only

title: Filter Dashboard to show only projects with active sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Projects table only shows projects where activeSessionCount > 0
Empty state shown when no projects have active sessions
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Filter applied before rendering project table

title: Remove summary stat cards from ProjectDetail page
acceptanceCriteria: 4 project summary stat cards removed from ProjectDetail.tsx
Project header/info remains but without stat cards
bun typecheck passes

title: Filter ProjectDetail to show only active sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Only sessions with status === 'active' are displayed
No toggle to view idle sessions
Empty state shown when no active sessions exist
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Remove ability to view idle sessions entirely

title: Replace sessions table with expandable card components
acceptanceCriteria: Sessions displayed as expandable cards instead of table rows
Card header shows: status badge, last activity, message count, tool calls, model
Chevron icon indicates expand/collapse state
Click on card header toggles expansion
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Use shadcn Card component with CardHeader for clickable area

title: Implement accordion behavior for session cards
acceptanceCriteria: Only one session card can be expanded at a time
Expanding a session collapses any previously expanded session
State tracked via expandedSessionId
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Accordion pattern - mutual exclusion for expanded state

title: Integrate TranscriptViewer in expanded session cards
acceptanceCriteria: Expanded card content shows full session transcript
Reuses existing TranscriptViewer component
Transcript fetched via useSessionDetail hook when expanded
Transcript area has max-height with overflow scroll
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Lazy-load transcript data only when session is expanded

title: Sort sessions by lastActivity descending
acceptanceCriteria: Sessions ordered with most recent activity first
Sort applied after filtering for active sessions
Order updates when session data refreshes
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Use Date comparison on lastActivity field

title: Auto-expand most recent active session on page load
acceptanceCriteria: First session in sorted list is automatically expanded on mount
Auto-expand only triggers when expandedSessionId is null
Works correctly on page refresh and navigation
bun typecheck passes
additionalNotes: Use useEffect to set initial expandedSessionId
